chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Eben Hopwil, p. 85 (88)—One of the Asha'man. He was about sixteen years old, and skinny. He had a big nose and ears to match. He died at the hands of Aran'gar during the cleansing of saidin near Shadar Logoth. See also Moseneillin, Daigian.
